summary: Comprehensive testing of Suribet Retailer Management module - all features working correctly including new DagrapportenPage with biljetten counting, multi-currency support, shifts with kasverschil tracking, and automatic calculations
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Suribet module fully tested. All features working: Dashboard with wisselkoersen/stats/biljettenanalyse/machine overzicht, DagrapportenPage with biljetten counting (SRD 5-500, EUR 5-200, USD 1-100) and automatic omzet calculation, Machines CRUD, Werknemers with Shifts tab and kasverschil tracking, Kasboek with machine/employee linking, Loonuitbetaling with automatic netto calculation

features: Wisselkoersen display (1 EUR = 38.5 SRD, 1 USD = 35.5 SRD)
Stats cards (Totale Omzet, Jouw Commissie, Deel Suribet, Netto Winst)
Secondary stats (Actieve Machines, Prestaties, Werknemers, Kas Saldo)
Machine Overzicht table with status badges
Biljetten Analyse section with SRD/EUR/USD breakdown
Stats cards (Totale Omzet, Jouw Commissie, Machines, Verlies)
- Berekening section (Totale Omzet, Deel Suribet, Jouw Commissie)
Nieuwe Machine modal with Machine ID, Locatie, Type, Status, Notities
Stats cards (Totaal, Actief, Inactief, Actieve Shifts, Kasverschil)
Shift Starten modal with Werknemer, Machine, Datum, Starttijd, Kasverschil, Notities
Transaction list with categories (Onderhoud, Loon, Commissie)
Nieuwe Transactie modal with Type, Categorie, Bedrag, Valuta, Machine/Werknemer linking
Stats cards (Totaal Uitbetaald, Aantal Betalingen, Gemiddelde Betaling)
Nieuwe Betaling modal with automatic netto calculation
Fields: Werknemer, Betaaldatum, Periode, Gewerkte Uren/Dagen, Basisbedrag, Bonus, Inhoudingen, Voorschot

dagrapport_with_biljetten.details: Created dagrapport with biljetten counting - SRD: 1660, EUR: 40, USD: 45, Total in SRD: 4797.5, Suribet deel: 2000.0, Commissie: 500.0
